title: Safety Evaluation and antioxidant potential of new probiotic strain Bacillus subtilis (NMCC-path-14) in Balb/c mice by sub-acute repeated dose toxicity
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Muhammad Usama Mazhar, Sadaf Naz, Jehan Zeb Khan, Sharjeel Khalid, Shakira Ghazanfar, Samy Selim, Muhammad Khalid Tipu, Sumel Ashique, Sabina Yasmin, Mohammed S. Almuhayawi, Aziza Alshahrani, Mohammad Yousuf Ansari
